title: Mike Harris
summary: Michael Deane Harris OOnt (born January 23, 1945) is a retired Canadian politician who served as the 22nd premier of Ontario from 1995 to 2002 and leader of the Progressive Conservative (PC) Party of Ontario from 1990 to 2002. A leader of the Blue Tory faction in the Ontario PC Party, Harris is noted for the "Common Sense Revolution", his government's program of deficit reduction in combination with lower taxes and cuts to education and social services.
